Summary: Old but perfectly serviceable Hampton Inn with a good price point for Orange County.  Friendly service at check in.  Dingy carpet and dated furnishings, but again the price was right.  Parking area was well lit which was helpful and safe.

Beautiful hotel!  Pandemic concerns: California has only recently lifted some of their COVID policies‚Ä¶ the hotel has social distancing markers and signs, plexiglas for separation of guest and staff at check in, etc.  Room: The room was clean and pretty! The decor is fresh and light. 2 Queen beds are a must for our family, but not always easy to find. These Queen-sized beds are great! There is a desk and chair as well as another desk/ table with a stool. Very helpful for our teens who want desk space as well. Small fridge, microwave and coffee are tucked away nicely. No sitting area in room.  Bathroom: sliding barn door on bathroom/ closet. Doesn‚Äôt bother us, but could be an issue for some people. The bathroom door doesn‚Äôt seal or lock.  Pool: what a beautiful pool area! Nice

I am hilton honors ( Silver) member we came in and choose a digital  check in but room showed delayed and the room was not ready at 5:30 PM.  So they offer me another room on first floor, I did not want to be there.  I prefer top level where there generally no pets and not much noise.  That is why I had pre-select room 319 not to far from the elevator.   They told us the cleaning crew as ill.   They did apologize  and so they get the room ready in about 10 to 15 min... from 5:30 PM.  We were at dinner went to Olive Garden why we waited.  The sofa was still dirty took pictures so I was not be held liable. , There was construction ( big crane and ball that hits the street) near this location but no one told us that at the time of booking.  So we give (3) stars for not a

Clean hotel and free breakfast. Breakfast options were a bit limited but decent. There was a bright light outside my room that made it a little hard to sleep but otherwise a good stay. Nice staff.  Parking is limited and just off a very busy street, but it is free and convenient to the hotel.
Room tip: Hard to turn left into the parking lot, so come in from the right.

Summary Heading: This will be my new place to lay my head when I‚Äôm in Mission Viejo
Summary: A family member suggested this place because they knew the other hotel I was staying at was becoming an awful experience. So I canceled my reservation at that other hotel and booked in at The Hampton.  Best decision ever! It‚Äôs clean, modern and easy to navigate through their app including picking my room ahead of time. Also the first time I used the digital key. Also had continental breakfast. There‚Äôs a pool and a laundry facility. Staff was very personable when I arrived and during my stay. It‚Äôs also located near shopping, restaurants and freeways. I know there‚Äôs a train nearby but I never heard it.  This will be my new place to stay when I‚Äôm in town

Summary Heading: Comfort in Southern California rain and cold
Summary: This hotel was great. Comfortable lobby, great staff and large well appointed room. Great complimentarry breakfast every day. Exercise room was small and well appointed and not crowded. The hotel location was great. Just off the 5 and walking distance to many resturants and shopping.

Noisy room from motors outside of room Odor in corridors and in the room were not pleasant  Sofa was tired took 3 replacements to get working refrigerator  After 3 replacements finally received a refrigerator that worked but it sat on the top of the counter because it couldn‚Äôt fit in the opening below the counter

Summary Heading: Ants in room and bloodstained sheets
Summary: I would not recommend this hotel. Stayed here for a weekend recently and our first room had ants in it crawling on the walls, nightstand and bed. We called the front desk to move to another room but they could only offer us another room for the night and we‚Äôd be required to move to another room the next day. When we got to our new room, I pulled back the quilt and found bloodstains on the bedsheet and had to ask for clean sheets. No one at the front desk really seemed to care or apologize sincerely about either issue. On top of that, both rooms were missing soap/bath gel so had to ask for that too. Pool is nice but it was full of floating dead bugs and I doubt they clean the pool often. It‚Äôs really not worth the $350+ nightly charge they had for this weekend ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

Everything was as expected. The room was nice and clean. There was a small sink and counter with a microwave and refrigerator. The free breakfast was good. There was easy access to freeway and fast food.

We stayed here during a Ragnar race.  It was nice that his place was very quiet as getting sleep during a 36 hour road race is important.  The staff was nice and helpful.  I would stay here again.  We didn't use any of the amenities.

Happy In all ways and forms and kinds I got the need and the privacy of dear friend and my self, I also loved how I was able to check in early and I got 3rd floor with a nice view. All the people where very kind and it felt safe to be In my room at all times

The location is right off the freeway. About 1 mile from a Costco Gas Nice walking areas at Saddleback College which is right behind it. Easy access and exit If I stay in Mission Viejo again... this would be a place to stay. The only thing I would say... is don't expect an Embassy Suites Breakfast... but they have hard boiled eggs, waffles, scrambled eggs, fruits and yogurts... sufficient for a quick light continental breakfast.

We have found in traveling,we always try to find to the nearest Hampton Inn in the area.We have never been disappointed.They have very high standards.Both my wife & I are retired for the past nine years & enjoy traveling.

Summary Heading: DO NOT STAY HERE-Floor is more comfortable than the bed
Summary: If you have any other options DO NOT STAY at this hotel. The beds are horrible. They are like two box springs put together with a thin plush layer. I brought Camille the front desk attendant to our room and she felt the bed and said ‚Äúthat‚Äôs not our bed; our beds don‚Äôt feel like‚Äù. It was so bad and so noisy my son slept on the floor; I didn‚Äôt sleep at all. I cried! I was told by the night auditor that we would be compensated for our miserable night but we have not been. They have been rude about it as well. I have lost all faith in Hilton after this. At any hotel the bed should be able to be slept in. This place is sad as well because after they moved us to a different room the following day, they put a non English speaking family in our old room. I can‚Äôt believe they operate

We breezed into town after a family wedding for a few days to continue to gather. We were greeted by two very friendly women. They welcomed us to their property and gave us all the information not only about the hotel but the surrounding area. This was a lovely stay in a clean, quite hotel, in a convenient area! Would stay again!

Clean, convenient and friendly accommodations at reasonable price. Continental breakfast a nice extra. There is no daily room cleaning currently, but easy to request fresh towels or other needs. It was unfortunate that the only tv channel accessible on the seating area tv was CNN.

Good price for the area. Close to the main hwy and nearby business, mall, and eateries.  Bed is a bit firm for my liking though. Parking is good and area is safe. If you want more space, I‚Äôd suggest the first floor because the ceilings are higher.

Summary Heading: Worst customer service I have seen in a long time.
Summary: I‚Äôd love to review my actual stay but unfortunately, my reservation was cancelled without notice.  I arrived here after 10 hours of travel only to learn they cancelled my reservation and gave my room away just an hour earlier.  My credit card was compromised the day before I left and apparently my ‚Äúhold‚Äù was declined.  When i didn‚Äôt check in before 6, they cancelled my 3 night stay.  While I understand a ‚Äúpolicy‚Äù, as unfortunate of a situation for me as this was for me, the 2 receptionists were smug, unapologetic and unhelpful.   While the outcome may not have changed, if they had any level of customer service aptitude, they would have demonstrated some empathy and perhaps taken 5 minutes to offer some direction since i was in a totally unfamiliar place amd travelling alone.
Manager Response: Hi KPL155,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience. Our hotel does not cancel any reservation without first giving guest the chance to update their credit cards. If you wish to discuss this further you can call the hotel and I will be happy to talk to you about our credit policy. I do apologize for your experience but I'm available to clarify any misunderstanding.

Summary Heading: What went wrong with this place?
Summary: This hotel has gone downhill fast. It was not the high quality that is often seen with Hampton Inn. It would get only a C- grade on cleanliness, service and noise. Only in a pinch would I stay there again. That is disappointing since the location works well for me.
Manager Response: Hi Jajalford,  Thank you for your review, we are sorry you did not receive the experience you expected from Hampton. We continue to work through these trying times and are still getting adjusted to our new normal. We do apologize for the  lack of service that was provided and hope you gives us another chance.

Summary: The room was clean, good price, friendly staff, great location. I didn‚Äôt partake in breakfast because I slept in‚Ä¶ did I mention the beds were sooo comfortable! The fridge and microwave were very convenient as well. One of the days we left after breakfast was over and we saw staff deep cleaning (sanitizing) the common areas, so we felt very safe from a pandemic standpoint for sure.

Everything was  excellent from the location, to the room, the check in and the breakfast. We would definitely stay here again and would highly recommend it to anyone visiting this area. Easy off/on to I-5.

Everything was what I expected.  Clean rooms, amenities, free parking, breakfast included, friendly staff.  Location was convenient and accessible from the freeway.  Not far from shopping and the beaches.

Wonderful service beautiful room service outstanding breakfast complete. I am always looking for Hampton as my first choice because of the all inclusive treatment as well as the dedication to Hilton‚Äôs honor program

It was an excellent, and warming stay. We stayed there two nights for the celebration of my daughter‚Äôs wedding. Other guests, and personnel were so friendly to us. Breakfast was delicious. Thank you!!

Great stay. Clean, new, good facilities and very good value. We stayed for one night as a family of four and it was perfect for us. The free breakfast was convenient and it was helpful we could eat takeaway the night we arrived in the dining room and by the swimming pool.

Hi prices and low service. Had to leave dirty towels and garbage in the hallway for housekeeping to pick up. Discussing! Breakfast items that made it worthwhile were eliminated. Not adequate seating in the room for two people. No glasses or cups for water.

Summary Heading: Clean and quiet and doesn‚Äôt smell
Summary: Very happy to find a hotel that was QUIET and clean.  I am very sensitive to noise and odors, which is a problem with most hotels. This hotel room did NOT have any strong obnoxious fragrances and it was very clean. (It also did not smell of bleach, as posted in another review.) I requested a room on the back side of the hotel (away from the freeway) and was able to pick my room location on the Hilton app the day before arrival!  This feature alone is worth being a Hilton Honors member. We had an issue with our air conditioner and were extremely pleased with how quickly the woman in charge of maintenance took care of our problem. She was considerate, kind, and helpful to our special needs! We had a larger king room and appreciated the large desk ( doubled as a table), couch, and

Front desk agents need better training! Was not accommodating at the slightest. Both were very rude and gave me looks that were not pleasant. Never got a thank you. Never got any restaurant recommendations and never got a thank you for being a Hilton honors member!

It was a trip that had been planned for some time by had been on hold due to the COVID shutdown of the past two years. When we were finally able to travel this was the Hotel recommended by the local resident who was organizing the event. The hotel was centrally located and in a perfect area for our activities.

Summary Heading: Rudest front-desk  staff I‚Äôve ever encountered.
Summary: Front desk was beyond rude. They clearly don‚Äôt care about customer service. They were unwilling to help or even pretend to help. My whole family was appalled at their lack of sensitivity.   Will NEVER stay there again.

There was no room service during our two day stay. We expected trash to be gone, towels restocked, etc like normal hotels do. There was a lack of service for whatever reason. When we requested for clean towels they were very quick to respond with fresh towels. Breakfast both days was limited to a few items or they ran out of things such as fruit within the first hour of breakfast. The only thing great about the hotel was the jacuzzi and heated pool.

Summary Heading: Great if you love the stench of bleach and no privacy!
Summary: The room and the property smelled heavily of bleach. While we appreciate cleanliness, the smell was so intense that it actually burned our noses through our masks, and dried out our eyes. It was not pleasant.   Many advertised amenities proved to be a lie. The photo of the property's swimming pool is clearly taken by wide angle lens and manipulated. IT IS TINY. The outdoor seating area was also disappointing. The cushions on the limited seating were old and dingy, torn and rather disgusting. There is zero care taken of them and we didn't see any efforts at cleaning outside at all during our two night, three day stay. The garden is riddled with weeds.   Breakfast staff was very friendly, but front desk staff was rude and accommodating, particularly when we asked to cancel our

This hotel was impeccably clean, quiet and had very comfortable beds. Great location. The check in was easy and I appreciated the online communication prior to the stay. I would definitely stay at this hotel again.

Summary Heading: I had a good stay except the check-out
Summary: I asked the staff during the early check-out if I may change my credit card.  She said no probably because she didn't want to do the work.  Then when I asked for the receipt, she pulled one out from the file.  I should have looked at it. There was a balance since it hasn't been charged.  Since the balance was different from what was charged to the credit card, I would have been in big trouble and likely not being reimbursed if I wasn't able to obtain a copy of the receipt from Hilton.com.

Summary Heading: I simply asked for one thing
Summary: An emailed receipt... couldn‚Äôt even get that ... you couldn‚Äôt even email me a receipt for my stay... seriously? That‚Äôs so easy ... maybe in the future you will respond to customers simple needs more often

We were unable to stay at a beachfront hotel in Dana Point because of renovations. Our last-minute change to the Hampton turned out to be great. We stayed 2 nights but would've been happy to stay longer. This hotel is beautiful and very functional. We had, I think, a king suite, which meant there was a nice couch, desk area and little mini-kitchen area with sink, microwave and fridge--exactly what we needed. The pool and spa were gorgeous. The Covid-era breakfast was  included quite a few things you could eat there or bring up to your room. Our room faced a hillside at the back, away from traffic, and we were able to see the bikes on our car to make sure they were secure. It was a fairly easy hop to the restaurants and beaches we wanted to get to, like 12-20 minutes to places

Summary Heading: Typical Hampton. Close proximity to I-5 and Ladera/MV/Laguna Niguel
Summary: Very clean rooms and lobby. Outdoor, it was a little nicer than what you would expect for other Hamptons. This is a newer property. My only surprise was how firm the beds were, not super comfortable. The linens were clean and I felt like this was a great value and good location.

Stayed at the Hampton Inn & Suites Mission Viejo over the weekend. Clean hotel and decent service throughout the stay. What really stood out and overly impressed us was Kaye during breakfast service. She had a great attitude and and very welcoming presence. The normal breakfast buffet is not open due to COVID, but the service we got from Kaye made up for the modified breakfast.

Summary Heading: Terrible Customer Service From The Manager Nativity Regaldo
Summary: Let me start by asking you, have you ever been denied check in because you go by your middle name on your Identification?  Well, that‚Äôs exactly what happened when I tried to check in through the manager Nativity Regalado at Hampton Inn & Suites Mission Viejo. I‚Äôve never been met with such terrible customer service and stubborn, arrogant behavior.  I have been a loyal Hilton Honors Guest for over 20 years now and have stayed at Hiltons all over the world through my business. Never once have I been denied check in because my reservation was made under my middle name and been told that my ID was unacceptable even when my middle name was clearly on it.   Does that even make any sense?  She told me to change the name to my first name on the reservation through the app I used to book

I thought Kaye was a wonderful asset to your company ! Friendly always asking how's your day anything I can help with . Smiling opening the door to hotel . Outgoing and personal. A true asset to hampton . The room was nice but had a stain on sheet ! Never found out what it was . Too late nite to change had to cover with towel . Never should have been put on bed ! Dept health very interested ! Other then that we were told by one lady at desk we could request to sit at fire pit when dark ! We did Carlos told us we couldn't closes at 7 . Communication problem ? Why sit at fire pit early before dark? They should have made adjustment or ? About the stain . No excuses filthy stained sheet

We were very impressed with this hotel and ultimately wished we had a little more time to enjoy the pool.  We just stayed a quick overnight as we were traveling from San Diego to LA after a Padres night game. Our room and the hotel overall was in excellent shape. The complimentary breakfast was terrific and started off our day in the right day.  If we are in the area again we would stay here again.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel with really good customer service
Summary: Fairly new property with unusually large lobby for an HI and a nice fire pit outside. Rooms are nice and good insulation, never heard anything at all. One issue was that the business centre computer system was refusing to connect to my airline! In stepped Charles from the front desk and used his computer to check us in and pay for the baggage! Exemplary service all round. One issue is it is in the south of MV and away from most restaurants, although the Cheesecake Factory is close by, missed Sheldon and the gang though!üòá

This was a great hotel close to many good restaurant areas and a mall. It was very easy to jump on I-5 and to get to work in the mornings! The hotel lobby was very nice as well as the morning breakfast. The pool was pretty small but they had a really nice fire pit outside by the pool.

Summary Heading: Clean and nice staff - good location
Summary: First I have to say that the hotel is clean and friendly staff.  But pick a room on the opposite side of the Volvo dealership.  Their blinding light penetrates the rooms. I recommend Burger IM in the same parking lot.  The breakfast was also good at the hotel.  Bed was comfortable.  Just hated that bright light all night long. And the hall carpet looks is an OCD nightmare.

Summary Heading: Newer Hampton Inn.  Clean.  Good location.
Summary: Sparkling new Hampton Inn right off the freeway.   Several restuarants nearby to walk to (some were under construction when I was there but that's temporary).   Good WIFI.  Comfortable beds.   Be aware that Mission Viejo is a suburb (and a very nice one), not a tourist destination itself but you are close to Dana Point and Laguna Beach.   You are also not in the main part of the town, but on the San Juan Cap/Laguna Nigel line, so don't expect to walk around Lake Mission Viego.  Saddleback College is up the road.   Evening staff were friendly and helpful.  Morning staff person was inattentive (if even at the desk).    Fridge in my upgraded suite was small.

Overall rooms was nice; with exception of my room not having a bath tub. Plus my King bed was hard. Food was okay, the area was nice with a lot of food and shopping options. The weather was beautiful as well.

Summary Heading: Fresh-smelling room and linens, every day!
Summary: I just love how fresh our room and linens smell every day, throughout the day!  If I were to take a wild guess, I'd say it's the smell of sandalwood. The hotel not only smells clean, it is clean throughout.  Our only suggestion is for the trash around the dining area to be cleared more frequently during breakfast hours.  Or perhaps add more trash cans around.    Hotel is a quick drive off the 5 freeway with convenient access to the 5 and 73 freeways.  Will add that Marguerite Parkway gets busy around 3pm and sometimes can be difficult turning in or out, but most drivers are courteous and will let you through.  It takes about 10-15 minutes to get to the Irvine area (with no traffic).  Location of the hotel is also convenient to eateries and shopping.  There's a DSW and a mall

We stayed here for a week while visiting family for Christmas. The location is great, as it is one block from the I-5. It is also 2 minutes to a mall and 5 minutes to a Target. There are several restaurants within the block and a Starbucks down the street. The hotel is next to a dealership, so the parking lot is safe and very well lit. The hotel is quiet. You cannot hear noise from the freeway, and the street is very lightly travelled at night. We returned after 8pm most nights and felt very safe.  The staff was very friendly and the front desk was never unattended.  The breakfast had a large selection each morning, and changed their hot menu selection each day, so a variety was provided.  We stayed in a king corner suite which was quite spacious and had large windows. It was

Summary Heading: This hotel has slipped a bit since my last stay
Summary: Although the location is very convenient to the family we were visiting, there was quite a bit of noise inside the hotel. I also dislike plastic utensils at the breakfast buffet.  I like this hotel for the location, but we did not have the most restful stay.

Loved this hotel. Rooms were clean, comfortable and quiet. Service was great and breakfast was decent with places to eat nearby. Had dinner delivered and process was quick and easy. Shout out to front desk person (forgot his name?) Who checked us in and made us feel extra special. Thanks!!

I'm not sure why I have to write 200 characters to have my review posted.  What's the point, the stay was great, the location was right where it would do us the most good (visiting family), and we always try to stay at Hampton Inns when we are traveling.  But 200 characters to get this posted???  I guess I'm almost there, but apparently still short a few letters.

2nd Time I've stayed at this Hotel.  It is very new, only 2 years old, and top-notch in every respect.  Great staff, clean lobby, rooms, and very comfortable beds. It is also conveniently located to my family.

Uncleaned bathtub full of sand upon checking in and one day when there was no housekeeping whatsoever.  Worse was the failure of management to address the problem.  Normal procedure in the hospitality business is to get on top of a situation like this by offering apology and either dollars off or honors points.  Had that been done I would not be writing this negative review.  As a long time Hilton Honors member I am shocked  by this lapse.

I needed a hotel close to my daughter in Mission Viejo.  I had watch this location be built and it is now about 2 years running.  Overall it was a pleasant stay for my 92 year young Aunt and I.  Even through not a ADA room there was a bar in the Bath/Shower which was helpful.  The location I was familiar with and it is between car dealers but it served our purpose.  Inside was lovely.

This is one of the newer Hampton Hotel building.  Clean and comparatively modern.   Enjoyed the stay and very convenient location off the highway.  Walls are little thin but didn't bother me too much. Wonderful lobby with a fireplace and a giant screen TV.

We were thrilled with being able to get in to our room early because we were exhausted. No shower cap, which was surprising. Mat and towels were extremely thin. Fortunately, it was just for one night. Breakfast? So so

Summary Heading: I Believe This Hotel Has Management Issues
Summary: My pre-check in experience was miserable.  I was attending a clergy meeting near the hotel and had notified the hotel in my reservation information that I would be checking in at approximately 4 PM.  At approximately 11 AM, I received a phone message from the hotel that I had given them an incorrect credit card number and that if I did not return their call by 3 PM, I would lose my reservation.  The actual fact was that I gave the reservations clerk the correct card number, he or she had written down one digit incorrectly.  Luckily I received the telephone call on a break.  Otherwise, I might have waited and returned the call after the deadline that they had imposed.  This is certainly not the way to treat a Hilton Honors Customer.  I asked to talk to the manager, and she was

Wonderful new property that is clearly well maintained. No special offerings however which is disappointing as a business traveler. Have stayed at older Hampton's that provide an evening social one week a night, as a way for business travelers to interact.   Little things could elevate this property to 'five stars' such as staff friendliness. You have to engage the staff in order for them interact with you. No hello's or have a good day on your way in and out. Limited knowledge of restaurants in the general area.   Positives were a clean, comfortable bed, as well as the overall room. Nice lobby and appreciate the outdoor lounge area! Will be returning a few more times, but would reconsider other options if brought back to the area more than the remaining two trips

New favorite for me! Modern and right up my alley! Freeway close without being on the freeway, quiet and beautiful. Staff was amazing, breakfast was good and I felt at home! One of the nicer Hamptons since it's new.

I've traveled almost weekly for the last 15 years and I've spent 2 nights a week here for the last 2 years, starting literally the month after they opened. This is a beautiful and well run property for sure, but the people are absolutely the best I've come across in all my travels. Thank you to my brother Carlos, my friends Karina (GM), Lupe, Angela, Dariah, Dina, James, Charles, Clark, Brian and Epi!   The amenities, breakfast, pool and fire pit are all tremendous - I could not recommend a hotel more highly. I truly enjoyed my stays at my home away from home and I will miss you all... until next time!  CoreyO.

I overall enjoyed my stay. However, despite having the refrigerator on the highest setting, it did not stay very cool. That caused my breast milk to spoil that I needed to store in the fridge. That was very frustrating for me, but the staff was all very friendly !

Although we asked/received early check-in,we stayed outside near the pool/cabanas b4 we went to our room. Loved the cozy firepit at night & gym. Comp breakfast was great. Bed comfortable. Famfriendly.

We had a great time with the stay and how all amenities and care of detail was met at a smaller property.   The breakfast was awesome and the staff are friendly and helpful    I would recommend this property to anyone

Great new hotel in the heart of Mission Viejo and convenient to everything North and South. Easy on and off the freeway. Lobby is bright, contemporary and new, room is spacious, comfortable and clean and staff were very friendly. Breakfast was plentiful and had great variety. Overall great stay!!

The breakfast choices could be better. There were a lack of healthy choices. The only healthy choice was the bananas although, there were a tad too ripe. The bulk cheerios weren't too bad, better than most hotels. They need to offer hot breakfast potatoes.

Attractive, well located hotel with modern beach decor with food within walking distance.  Close to the 5 freeway to get to your destination quickly.  Large bathrooms and comfortable beds,  I would stay here again.

My familyy was out visiting our Marine. The hotel was a great stay especially after a 14 hour drive. The breakfast was great, the pool was nice and the hot tub was WOW.  The seating area outside by the resturant with the flame was relaxing.   I am a Hilton rewards member and wish all my stays were this nice.

The hotel was great. It was super convenient off the freeway, close to gas stations, and food places. We were there for a waterpolo tournament and it was a great place to stay. It was also convenient having breakfast at the hotel.

This Hampton Inn is very new, clean, and modern.  The lobby and pool lounge areas are both inviting and nicely decorated.  All the staff we encountered, from the desk staff to the ones walking around, were all very friendly and nice.  Our room was clean and comfortable.  The breakfast buffet had a nice selection of items, from fresh pressed juices to a hot waffle maker.  Overall, a great stay!

First rate property which is what I come to expect with a Hampton Inn location.  The location was good but a bit tight getting in and out, but the hotel is beautiful and staff was above and beyond helpful.

The hotel was incredibly clean and the staff was friendly, courteous and attentive. However, the bed was so hard that my sleep was disturbed each night. I've never slept on a worse mattress. I had stayed at a Hampton Inn a couple of months previous to this (in Tucson, AZ) and the bed was the same way - extremely uncomfortable. I suffered through each day with back and neck pain from the bed. I don't know why a beautiful and clean hotel can't invest a bit more in their mattresses. I won't stay at Hampton Inn again because of their terrible mattresses.

This is a great hotel in a good location, easy access on-off I-5 South Orange County area. Very clean hotel, great rooms, bedding and furniture was updated and in excellent shape. A/C was cold and kept the room very comfortable. Hotel staff freiendly and fast.

The hotel was easy to get to. It‚Äôs in a quiet area although I was there on a Saturday. Very relaxing environment with modern beach motif. Clean comfortable rooms that look brand new. I like the outside fire pit area and the big open space there.

I typically stay at Full Service Hilton properties when traveling, and not Hampton Inn's, however choices are limited in Mission Viejo. I must say the quality of this hotel as well as the friendly staff were superb. My room was clean and quiet, except for a slightly squeaky bed frame. Unfortunately the complimentary breakfast was terrible. I would recommend the hotel, and will stay again when I return, however I recommend eating breakfast at one of the local restaurants.

Summary Heading: Clean Hotel, Staff OK, Good Location
Summary: 1) The hotel appears to be brand new and the housekeepers are very responsive and helpful.  Front desk ok.  It's very clean (the one area that was not clean was quickly remedied).  Clean with comfortable beds makes for a high recommendation.  2) Staff responsive but not friendly (other than one girl who helped someone else). Also, I don't like to be lied to by staff--they said there were no king rooms available instead of the double queen I had booked.  And yet the hilton site showed kings available to book even at 4 p.m. on the day of check in.  As an honors member I'm very used to being moved into a king room if one is available. It makes no difference when I can't get the preferred king--unless and until you lie about it.  3) Hilton has taken away our free water perk at this

Summary Heading: Super friendly and attentive staff, above and beyond customer service.  Place looks really clean, keep it looking like n
Summary: Place looks brand new, love the friendly staff, very attentive and professional.  Felt like staff goes above and beyond to help you find places to visit. Rooms are in excellent shape, location is right by the freeway.

Booked at short notice & secured good rate. Free parking at hotel. Very friendly staff.  Immaculately clean. Good sized room. Two queen sized beds with good quality linen. Took 3rd floor room with no noise issues. Hairdryer, toiletries, iron facilities and breakfast all included.  Well located for Laguna, La Jolla & Mission Beaches plus local restaurants.  Would highly recommend.

Our family spent three days in Hampton Inn & suits for vacation. It has clean and new facilities, friendly staff, convenient location and nice bed. We‚Äôll definitely be back if visiting SD or LA again.

Summary Heading: A great place to stay in SoCal
Summary: A great stay at a great value!  I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel. It seemed almost brand new. Friendly staff, quiet guest room. Very nice amenities too. They had a full breakfast with very fresh coffee.

This hotel is right off the freeway. It is still very new. The decor is nice. The hotel is clean. The rooms are nice and clean. Breakfast was good. The staff was kind. The fireplace at night was very pretty.

Excellent hotel ! We had a horrible experience with AMTRak, and as a result we were too late for the 1st night into the hotel, but the hotel made it no big deal, and we still could stay. I would reccomend it to anyone!

This was our second stay. On both occasions, we were greeted by the friendly staff. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Complementary breakfast was quite good. You can even make your own fresh waffles. Pool, hot tub, and a nice fire pit to sit out and enjoy the weather. Noticed on this latest trip that more fast food had opened in the immediate area although there are plenty of restaurants to choose from not far from the hotel.

The Hampton Inn & Suites is a small hotel with the comforts of a much larger one!  The hotel is immaculate and the staff extremely helpful and accommodating.  Breakfast is included and includes waffles- who could ask for more?  There are several amenities within walking distance, including restaurants, bars, liquor store, and coffee shops.  This place is a California dream!

I had not heard of this hotel location but it was recommended by a colleague.  It is a fairly new hotel & they have done a great job of keeping it that way.  Friendly staff, convenient to the freeway and close to restaurants.  A little pricier than I thought, but would not deter me from coming back.

Updated property, rooms are very clean and beds are very comfortable.  We stayed for business and lobby afforded us comfortable work space with internet access. Outdoor fire pit is a bonus. Highly recommended.

Nice hotel, convenient location, clean.  Wish breakfast had more Keto friendly options.  Fire table was a nice touch for evening relation.  Staff was very friendly, professional, and helpful.  Room was nicely appointed and clean.  Will be back.

Never again!  We stayed here while construction was going on at our house.  Pretty hotel, small but nicely decorated rooms...but oh my gosh...The noise was UNBEARABLE!  There must have been kids staying in the room above and they were constantly running and jumping off the beds, it was terrible. Sounded like we were staying under a bowling alley. Called to complain at 10:30 pm, front desk said they‚Äôd contact the guests.  It quieted down for a couple hours then started again non-stop.  Contacted the desk several more times, and at 5:30 asked them to come and hear for themselves.  At 7:00 called again and asked for someone to come listen to what we were having to endure.  Never were we offered another room, just told ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry‚Äù We checked out early, we both are exhausted and have

I was so impressed with the front desk personnel (Carlos) and even the overnight person (Clark). Carlos greeted me with a smile and attended to my questions with kindness and professionalism. In addition, when I asked if there were any chocolate chip cookies versus oatmeal raisin, he went and baked it and even delivered it to my door! Exceptional customer service. Clark was at the front desk when I was headed to the gym before 6am and he let me in a few minutes earlier so that I could get my workout in before breakfast and to get on with my work day. The facility was clean, modern and quiet. I would definitely go back to this hotel if needed.

Summary Heading: This hotel must try to improve. Don‚Äôt rely on just being a new hotel.
Summary: We spent four nights in this hotel from May 29 to June 1, 2019. Stayed at a 2nd floor room with two queen beds.   On the first night, there were bumping noises upstairs like someone was jumping or marching. Heavy footsteps. This was the same situation on succeeding nights, occurring mostly at night when it‚Äôs time to rest and sleep, between 11pm to 2am.  Cleaning and kitchen staff don't speak English.   Found the hotel to be relatively far from the usual tour area, the harbor and Dana point. It‚Äôs near the malls. The taxi driver was even asking us why we chose a hotel sitting on nowhere.  Suggestion:   We stayed at the 2nd floor, and there were always bumping noises upstairs like someone was jumping or marching. Heavy footsteps. 2) Cleaning and kitchen staff don't speak English.

Nice, clean, quiet hotel, conveniently located. Staff was very nice, cleaning staff excellent. Breakfast was perfect, attractive pool area with big fire pit and lots of seating. Will stay there again.

Outstanding place to stay. Clean rooms. This Hampton Inn was the best one i ever stayed in. Great location. Complimentary breakfast was not what I expected. Great customer service and highly recommended

I was greeted at check in about 6:00pm.  Very friendly staff.  I had room 241, second floor.  Two queen sized beds with fluffy blankets, four fluffy pillows per bed. The thermostat was easily adjustable for heat or cool.   Real quite, clean room, big TV.  Cleaning staff were great, room was always cleaned timely.  I was here for a wedding.  No problems.  The room had a small refrigerator where I kept my drinks cool.  No one bothered them.  Even though there is a car dealership next door, it did not bother or interfere with my enjoyment of the room.

The Property Manager does not believe in good customer service. She needs to work on her following through skills. I love the housekeeping staff is amazing, wish the front desk people understand the meaning of service. And took care of the customer's needs!
Manager Response: Hello Dreamer35450123182,  We are happy that you love our housekeeping staff, as most people forget about our hotel heroes. They will be very happy to know about your feedback. Please accept my apology about not following up but if you wish to discuss any matter further you can always email me as my weekly schedule changes every week. I don't have a set schedule like most General Managers that are in Monday through Friday. Once again I do apologize on my behalf and front desk staff.

Summary Heading: Great location and even better hotel
Summary: Stayed at the Hampton Inn and Suites in Mission Viejo because it was located near the Metro line (walking distance) and near my BFF who we were visiting.  What an incredible Hampton Inn as it is the best one I have stayed at!
Manager Response: Hi hkymngsp,  We hope next time you come visit your friends you decide to stay with us again. As you mentioned we are near The Laguna Niguel/Mission Viejo station making it easy to travel to other cities. Maybe next time you can take the train down to San Clemente Beach which is only a few miles away. We are very happy you enjoyed your stay while you were visiting us.

Summary: Location is great, very easy to get to but staff will greet you readily enough but slow to no response to problems. Room cleaning often doesn't occur till evening even when you see maintenance cart a few doors down at breakfast time.  Wifi is sketchy at best.  Requests re problems are ignored.  Plus side, neutrogena complimentary products, beautiful patio and pretty decent breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear buzzrdwing,  Thank you for taking the time to post a review about our hotel. We are very sorry we were not able to resolve your problem in a timely manner. We strive to make every guest's stay a home away from home experience but it looks like we failed during your stay. If you wish to discuss this issue further please give me a call, I would like to get more feedback so we can prevent other guests from having the same experience.

Summary Heading: Amazing experience, thanks to incredible staff!
Summary: We stayed at the Hampton Inn & Suites Mission Viejo not long ago but the impression we have of this property will last a lifetime! Thank you Dalia( Front desk) Karina ( General Manager), Carlos ( Front desk) , Maritza( Housekeeping), because of you we had a great time and we'll definitely be back! Your hospitality and professionalism is what makes this place wonderful! Thank you! AP

Family visit to So California to visit family members. This is the second time I‚Äôve stayed at this hotel this year. The kids enjoy the pool. The complimentary breakfast was pretty good for a free meal.

Summary Heading: Low cost but felt like royalty
Summary: The staff was amazing. The facility was beautiful and in a great location. The rooms were very comfortable and quiet. If you need anything the staff are at your door in minutes with what you need. The pool is very nice as well. Highly recommend.

Nice overnight stay to celebrate an anniversary.  Room was clean and my 6‚Äô4‚Äù husband could actually stand up in the shower as the shower head was high enough.  Television has several music channels for ambience.

Stayed at this hotel for one night for a tennis tournament. The room was very clean, new and extremely soundproof. The staff was very friendly and professionally. The hotel was very convenient to the freeway and eating places.

Reservation was gained using the Hilton App, with info already on file check-in was less than 5 minutes. This hotel is new, very nice and well maintained. Rooms are clean, quiet and comfortable. They provide a complementary breakfast which is adequate. There is a lot of nearby shopping. The hotel is about a mile from Mission Valley Hospital. The only down side was they charge for a bottle of water and there wasn't the usual follow up email.

This was the most pleasant experience we have had in staying at a hotel.  My kids love the pool and we enjoyed the complimentary coffee and hot chocolate.  All the staff were very nice and always has a smile on their faces. We would definitely stay here again in the future.

This is the perfect location to easily get to from the airport (SNA) if you are doing business in Aliso Viejo, Ca. The rooms are great and the staff is fantastic! The pool are and hot tub are perfect for relaxing in the evening after work. I will for sure be back.

My family and I spent the night in the area and we were all quite pleased with our stay.  Hotel has excellent accommodations as well as a very nice outdoor lounge area with quite modern aesthetics.  The staff could not have been more helpful. We certainly look forward to staying here again I would highly recommend it for its location to all the nearby family activities in the area.

The staff was great and the rooms were clean and large.  Easy location for the 5 freeway.  A good value for the area.  Parking was free which is rare these days.  Rooms have mini refrigerators and coffee.

Needed a place to stay for a few days due to business in Mission Viejo. Perfect location, easy to find off the freeways, close to shops.  Pleasant and helpful staff, nice simple breakfast buffet, clean room and a mini fridge that keeps things cold!

Recommended for quality at a fair price, easy parking, nice rooms, good breakfast options, and easy access. The bed was comfortable,nice TV,welcome microwave and fridge. Rooms are quiet, and even the lights of the nearby auto dealer was ok.

Many gathered for a family event at the Hampton Inn  that had reserved a block of rooms for us.  (15 rooms booked in all) From a family of four with a four year-old to a single woman of 80+, wach and every guest was delighted with the hotel.  it is new ( less than 2 years old), immaculate, colorful, light and airy.  The breakfast (included) was varied and extensive, including pastries, muffins, yogurt, cur melons, whole fruits, make your own waffles.  The hotel entrees changed daily and included eggs, bacon, French toast sticks, sausages, etc.   The pool is small but lovely with chaises, both in tents and outside.  The hot tub had a lovely waterfall.  Electronic fires enclosed in glass lit up the area at night. The rooms are spacious and complete.  Ours had a king sized bed,

Came here for personal family travel. We loved the location and cleanliness of this property. Great value, great breakfast. We'd definitely love to stay again when our family is in town and would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a hotel in South OC.

Spend the weekend in this hotel. Beautful relaxing decor in room. Bed very comfortable. Felt at home. All necessary amenities available, Free WIFI, iron, in-room coffee pot with coffee and tea. Complimentary breakfast was excellent and really appreciated, especially since we were short of time and wanted to start our days as soon as possible.

Our stay was a very positive experience. The staff was helpful and kind. The room was clean and comfortable. The bed and bedding were soft and comfortable leading to a good nights sleep which for me in a strange bed is rare. The complimentary breakfast and Robust coffee was a nice finish. I would recommend your hotel in a heartbeat.

Had a last minute stay.  Front desk was helpful during check in.  Rate was great.  We enjoyed the free breakfast.   Room was very nice and clean.  Most of all room was quiet.  Overall this is a great hotel with friendly staffing

Everything about this Hampton Inn was great.  Close to freeway,Mission Viejo mall, restaurants,  A very well maintained property, with helpful, friendly, professional staff.  The rooms were lovely and public areas welcomng. Would stay again..

Great staff. Workable breakfast, spotlessly clean. Really? I need 200 characters??i don‚Äôt what to say  Volvo is next door and coffee bean is across the street. So is Beoken Yolk but $20 for one person is just stupid.

Good room, even better staff.  Excellent stay.  Liked the succulent cactus and plants on the roof.  Will attempt to get the same room again when back in the area.  Would recommend without hesitation. ....

I was pleasantly surprised by how new, modern and CLEAN this place was. Perfect for the great price we paid, not luxurious, but comfortable, quiet, no weird smells of any kind. There was plenty of free parking and a breakfast buffet (which we didn't have time to try). There was a refrigerator and coffee maker in the room (no microwave). Overall, great value for the money!

Summary Heading: Excellent stay - this is our new home base for house hunting in this area !
Summary: We spent a single night here last weekend while on a hunt for a rental property in the area. I think I remember reading that this was the newest hotel in the Mission Viejo area - it has a brand-new scent and feeling to it for sure.   We didn't hang out at the hotel much at all because we were out seeing properties all day on Saturday and then checked out on Sunday morning - but I wanted to write a review about our experience because it was so positive and excellent.   We had used the online checkin on the Hilton app and chosen a room - when we arrived early at the hotel, we inquired about early checkin but we didn't expect that certain room to be ready or even to be able to check in at all. I wish I could remember the name of the front desk agent who offered us a king room in

Great service very clean. Nice area no loud noise perfect for a relaxing stay. Quick check in and check out process. Plenty of parking available. Even though location is on a busy street and near car dealers once inside you would never know.

A very nice stay! Close to shopping and beaches. The staff was friendly and accommodating. Fresh fruit, coffee and tea available all day and night definitely a plus! Easy access to highways and interstates.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel. Top of the chain
Summary: I am so pleased with this hotel from top to bottom. The front desk staff and the breakfast crew do a great job. Hotel is very clean (doesn‚Äôt hurt that it‚Äôs pretty new. Has a nice workout room with plenty of space.

great service, always the employees concern about every detail, room was cleaned very good, good location for my personal things, parking was safe, breakfast very fresh, was a real pleasure stayed in this hotel.

This location provides great access to major roadways to access all that Laguna Beach has to offer. The staff was exceptionally helpful, professional and genuinely good people. The rooms were clean, quiet and comfortable.

Rooms clean nice clean sheets . Pool gym nice didn't had a chance to use them . I came because my friend told me that the breakfast was good and staff members were nice. NOT!! the breakfast lady was so rude and was just throwing the trays with anger ,couldn't even speak to her. She had a bunch of tattoos and a bunch bracelets that was centering the food . She should know better not to have bracelets while working with food. And she needs to fix her attitude.  Not coming back I would like to get contact back if the manager cares about the customer's.
Manager Response: Hi Fearless25295941064,  Thank you for taking the time and providing feedback about your stay. I wanted to apologize for your experience during breakfast. We have talked to our Breakfast Attendant to make sure no other guests have to go through the same experience. If you wish to discuss this further I'm available, please give me a call. Once again I do apologize.

Summary: Nice room - quiet and clean. Efficient check in and out.  Nice outside deck/pool area. Clean fitness center.  Place looked new.  Would stay again.Normal free breakfast. Easy parking and access to freeway.

The hotel is new, so everything was excellent. The breakfast was really great. It was nice to have it available since I was up early and off to meetings. I would highly recommend this hotel if you are in the area for business.

Summary Heading: Nice rest and couples date at the Hampton
Summary: We had a wonderful time just  I should have looked harder for the room I wanted. I would advertise all my friends and Instagram followers to try the Hampton out as it is a relaxing inn for a decent price.

The room was clean plus the hotel was able to accommodate my early check in request.  Also enjoyed sitting by the fire outside by the pool.  Lots of food options close by and easy access to the highway.

Stayed from a Friday to a Monday morning. Location is close to several freeways and many restaurants and stores.  Service was friendly and desk clerk was very helpful on check-in.  The complimentary breakfast did include eggs and protein for those who ate gluten-intolerant

The breakfast was so wonderful and  rocio Sanchez was so nice and clean . We had a wonderful conversation and she was the only person I was able to understand me and she speak English.  Their was a lady in breakfast with tattoos all over her hands. And arms I don't agree of people handling with food and having a bunch of tattoos their was another lady name rocio but she didn't speak English and couldn't understand me at all. Her hair was all over the place and her clothes was dirty too. I'll definitely come back here if rocio Sanchez is there. The breakfast was well cooked.  Rooms were neat too.

I stayed here to celebrate Christmas early and was very pleased and surprised great staff, great location very clean and comfortable room. The breakfast was very nice with good choices. I didn‚Äôt use the exercise room but very accessible.

Summary Heading: Very friendly service and excellent room.
Summary: Came to the hotel and received very welcome and friendly service / checkin ... always available for a chat and help. Good reception area and great outdoor place near fire place and swimming pool. Enough parking area and free WiFi

The moment you walk in you feel the vibe. This place feels new, has an awesome chic style. It's a 5* quality. Similar style as Home2sweet. Lovely water and fire features, lobby is amazing and inviting. Rooms are good size with large ceiling.

Overall the place is nice enough. We were looking forward to the free breakfast but when we saw that they put ham in the eggs we had to go to a restaurant for breakfast. Very disappointed because we don‚Äôt eat pork!! I don‚Äôt think you should put pork in the eggs have it on the side so people have choices.

The service here was awesome! I wasn't trated this well at hotels I'd spent much more for. Thought I was the very first guest to stay in my room it was so clean. Couldn't believe it when they told me I wasn't. Great beds. Great staff. Great service. Decent breakfast.

Summary Heading: Would go back in a heartbeat
Summary: Lovely staff and beautiful rooms, however nearby construction woke us up once or twice. The breakfast spread was a go-to for us as we are in a rush most mornings, though I would have preferred a better quality selection as I got sick from what I assume was the eggs. Other than those two tidbits, we had an amazing time and truly appreciate all the kindness of the hotel staff. Thank you for a pleasant visit.

On a recent visit to Laguna Beach, Silver Sage Magazine stayed at one of Hampton Inn‚Äôs newest acquisitions. Located in Mission Viejo, a mere 12 min drive to Laguna- it offered all the amenities at a great price!   Of course the silver and sage decor was an added value bonus for us!  Outdoor pool and huge fireplace area offered a relaxing way to chat at the end of each day.  The beds were ridiculously comfortable, the rooms spotless, and the breakfast each morning had enough of everything to satisfy all.  We also loved that ice machines were all located in the elevator areas so as not to disturb any guest‚Äôs rooms.  Rooms were quiet and spacious. Easy enough to fit several people, wheelchair if needed or just spread out.  We‚Äôll definitely return any time we come back to Laguna!

Hotel is fairly new so everything looks and feels amazing.  Location was good.  Free breakfast and parking was a huge plus; not to mention a great savings.  I would recommend and also stay again if ever in the area again.

The staff here was incredibly nice and helpful. The room was nice, breakfast very good.  I highly recommend this Hampton Inn. We had a family member at the Mission Hospital and this hotel was close by. The staff did all they could to accommodate us.

Staff is super friendly and accommodating. THEY ARE GREAT!! Rooms are cute and very clean. Would totally recommend this location. Freeway access is nice too. The parking could be better if you have extra cars or people visiting you.

Great location, clean and the  staff were super. The Hotel is located in an area that has short trips to the beach, mountains and/ or other locations. local restaurants were great and the airport is within 30 minutes.

We enjoyed and would highly recommend this location !!Friendly, helpful staff. Great location! Easy access to Hwy and plenty of food establishments within walking distance. Nice hottub/spa, pool and outside sitting area.The weather was perfect too!!

Summary Heading: 1 year old hotel, great location to the 5.
Summary: Spacious suite with comfortable bed and pillows.  Sink area separate from shower and toilet, nice feature for 2 people. Staff very accommodating and friendly.  Breakfast was your typical hotel selection. We stayed for a week so after day 2 breakfast was nothing special.  Be aware of major parking garage construction next door and noise starts at 7:00am.  Select a room on the side of the Audi dealership for a quieter experience. Would certainly stay again because of the newness, cleanliness and location.

Summary Heading: Sales call south Orange County California
Summary: I needed to stay in the south orange county area, this facility was conveniently located to where I needed to stay and priced competitively. This is a newer facility, rooms were very lovely, and slightly upscale compared to other Hampton Inns, ( I am a Hilton Diamond Member & stay very frequently).  The staff are helpful, and the outside pool area is AWESOME!

Went to Mission Viejo to visit family and stayed at this hotel to use honor points. This is a fairly new hotel and the location is close to many things. They have coffee bean and tea leaf and mission viejo mall across the street.  Easy on/off freeway exits also. The rooms were so nice and clean and comfortable and the pool and spa were nice. The complimentary breakfast each morning was very nice.

Summary Heading: Very Convenient hotel for short stay
Summary: I enjoy staying in this hotel. It has everything for short stay. Room is big and convenient for both work and rest. TV had all channels that I usually watch. Pool is small and shallow but water is warmed and you'll still enjoy short swimming there. Jacuzzi is roomy and  works great.   I want to say special thanks for breakfast.  Breakfast selection was so rich , I was able to skip lunch after that. Even coffee was pretty good with big selection of pastries.

This is the best Hampton Inn property I've stayed in thus far. Staff was very friendly and accommodatinh. The rooms are top notch for the price. Will be staying at this location again next time I'm in the area.

Excellent hotel, excellent location.  Nice breakfast buffet, nice and helpful staff, beautiful and spotless room.  The extra was an easy to use alarm clock next to the bed, a night light in the bathroom and a good TV.  I'd stay there again!

Parking was a tight and location a little hard to get into but overall I enjoyed my stay.  The breakfast changed on some items (sausage on one day and bacon on the next). Hopefully they will offer both for those who prefer one item over another.

A very nice hotel but, they had a barn door type of door for the bathroom, which gave no privacy.   There was no microwave in our room.  For the cost of this hotel I think they could have done a little better. Disgusting coffee and coffee maker in room.

We stayed at the Hampton with six other families. Our boys play baseball and we had a tournament in San Clemente. Our stay was perfect, from the front desk, to the pool, the breakfast, and the rooms. The staff was friendly and welcoming. Great place to stay.

This Hampton Inn is awesome!  The staff are friendly and helpful.  Happy to answer questions.  The pool area is small however beautifully done.  My children enjoyed going down for a swim each night.  Breakfast was good and breakfast staff was friendly.  The hotel is brand new and very clean.  We don't have a single complaint.  We will stay again our next visit.

Summary Heading: Always stay at this hotel when visiting daughter and grandchildren.
Summary: We always stay at this hotel when visiting our daughter in Mission Viejo, California.  It affords a clean quiet room with all the amenities.  They serve a buffet breakfast each morning at no charge to the patrons..

Very clean and friendly place, complementary breakfast was very nice and the pool area is great for relaxing. Room was very clean, and staff is very helpful and accommodating. Location is close to The Coach House as well.

Summary Heading: OK but not worth the money
Summary: OK but not worth the $200 for one night for one person. Don't let you pay cash and just run your card to have on file. Took room and deposit out of card, and it took forever for deposit to come back. Nice breakfast, nice room, but smells of air freshener. Pool nice but right next to parking lot and visible from lobby.

Beautiful hotel, close to freeway for access to Irvine or the beach within 15mins. Carlos at the front desk was the man. He is solely the reason I would go back. Guy works hard to make sure all guest feel important

We highly recommend this new hotel and would definitely stay here again! The staff were amazing and the complimentary breakfast was great! Karina and Dina were very friendly and hospitable. We were an hour or so early and the room wasn't quite ready but Karina upgraded our King room at no extra charge and allowed us to check in early.

Great hotel for access to Laguna, San Juan Capistrano and Dana Point. Lots of conveniences in the immediate area of the hotel as well (shopping, food, gas). Perfect for a few day get away to explore the area. The hotel is on the smaller size which meant it was not crowded in the pool area or at breakfast time, very helpful.

We recently stayed at this hotel with our family as we were passing through.  We didn't have any set plan and asked the girls at the front desk for ideas and suggestions.  The staff was very helpful and friendly and honest.  We enjoyed their big smiles when we told them about taking them up on their suggestions and appreciated the help!  The breakfast in the morning was outstanding and the breakfast attendants were very helpful!  Thank you!

I was very happy with everything the hotel had to offer.. It was clean / quiet at night even though it was quiet busy. I went down for coffee one morning it was busy yet clean, I saw a staff member making sure everything was tidy.  I was able to see the staff change and they were all so sweet!!!!  I will definitely come back.

I could not find a hotel in San Clemente and saw that Hampton Inn in Mission Viejo had room. It is brand new and was one of the best Hampton Inn‚Äôs I have stayed in. The drive to San Clemente was painless.

Summary Heading: Stayed there for a family reunion in Laguna Nigel
Summary: It is a truly nice place to stay. Breakfast was really good and everything looks modern and new. Staff was extremely helpful. I would definitely stay there again when I‚Äôm in Mission Viejo. The price point ore night was a much better option that trying to stay in Laguna Nigel. We were ten minutes away from the park where the reunion was held.   (I could not rate the services, sleep, and value. Five across the board for our stay.)

We very nice new hotel.   Very clean.   Nice fire pit with cute sitting area.  Pool was a bit small, but I‚Äôve bever noticed more than 4 people in it at once so I guess it was fine.   Our room was the furthest room possible from the elevator, but there is a back parking entrance so we just parked there instead.   Breakfast was very mediocre.  Just what I would expect from a ‚Äúfree‚Äù breakfast.   Nothing fancy.  Washer was broken for most of the day.   When we got back around 10:30 pm the guy at the front desk did unlock it and let me run a load of laundry since it was down during the day.   That was super nice of him as laundry hours are over at 10pm.  I would definitely stay here again.   Close to the freeway, clean, nice and bright.

The Hotel staff was so nice and helpful.  Rooms were very clean, roomy and beautiful.  The pool and fire pit were very well kept and enjoyable.  We couldn‚Äôt be more pleased with this stay!  If we come back this direction, we will return to this hotel without doubt.

Impressed from the minute we walked in. Staff was great, room was very clean and the breakfast the next morning is everything you expect. You can tell by how clean is it must be a newer hotel. Recommend it ! Right off the I-5 and Avery Parkway.

Summary Heading: Perfect, in every way possible. Exceeded our expectations!
Summary: Exceeded our expectations by far! Breakfast was always replenished and clean area. Rooms were amazing and the housekeepers were on it. The pool and hot tub were always so clean and refreshing! Everything was just excellent!!

Beautiful , new, clean, hotel. Nice breakfast, outstanding staff, comfy brfs, big-screen t.v. Very minor inconveniences, such as t.v. placed awkwardly & microwave sliding around, but overall, one of the best hotels I've ever stayed in!

I was happy to find out that this is a relatively new Hampton Inn. The rooms are well appointed and the nighttime views of the pool and outdoor fire pit elevate the feel of the hotel.   The mini 24-hour convenience store is a really nice amenity to have when you don't want to conquer suburbia late at night.

Brand new, excellent location, quiet and easy acces. Small but nice. I will recommend it to friends or any one who wants to stay in the area. Breakfast is not fancy but enough to start the day. Nice small pool and jacuzzi. Very well found nice hotel.

This a very reasonably priced hotel with little touches that makes it feel above average. From the moment you walk in, the lobby has an aesthetically pleasing look, modern, clean but comfortable. At night you are immediately drawn to the outside fireplace area with plenty of sitting space. We saw a family enjoying some pizza while sitting by the fire after spending some time in the adjacent pool.  The pool was big and clean. They had a cabana and some additional lounge chairs.  The jacuzzi had a very cool waterfall feature that would turn on automatically when the spa jets would time out.  The pool towels were actually soft, not worn out like most pool towels are. The hotel staff was friendly, professional and immediately attended to the needs of the guests. They even had free

Hampton Inn and Suites is always a good bet but this one was recently remodeled and it is beautiful!  Loved the facility, the pool the dining room  -  all fantastic!  We wished we had brought our suits to enjoy the pool, we will next time!

Stayed here for one night on our way from Legoland to Disneyland. This was about the midway point. Newer built Hampton Inn. The room was clean. Pool area looked nice though we did not take advantage of it. Close to nearby restaurants too.  Breakfast the next morning was okay. Some Hampton Inns are better than others. I thought this breakfast was adequate but not great.   Good place for one night stop with the family.

We stayed here just one night to attend a friend's birthday in Laguna Niguel. I chose it based on the location and the previous good reviews. The hotel and room was very clean and comfortable and the staff very friendly and helpful. We didn't enjoy any of the other amenities since we were there for such a brief time, but it all seemed very nice. I'd stay here again for sure.

We stayed here for a vacation with our grandson.  The staff was wonderful, loved the pool, cabanas and hot tub.  The food was wonderful.  This hotel has it right, I wish all hotels were like this one!!  We really enjoyed our stay.

Summary Heading: Good for Swallows Cup Soccer Tournament
Summary: Close to the fields if you're playing a tournament in the south Irvine area. Fire pit was roomy and the pool and hot tub are nice. Free breakfast is a bonus and lots of room for your team to stretch out. Rooms were clean and the hotel has a modern look and right next to the freeway. Our team would stay here again!

Hotel was new and clean. Beds were comfortable and staff was friendly.  The breakfast was just ok though. Coffee was not strong. Ended up going out for Starbucks each morning but otherwise a great experience

Just took a short 4 day 3 night trip out to California.  The Hampton Inn and Suites is where my family of 4 stayed and we all enjoyed the hotel.  Most important to me, its clean and the staff were friendly.  Breakfast is included and each day was a nice assortment of eggs, meat, breads, cereals, and make your own waffles.  The pool was warm and clean.  There is a nice little workout room as well.  Its about a 15 minute drive to the beaches by Dana Point and about a 40 minute drive to Legoland.  The hotel is located right off the I-5 but the surrounding area seemed nice.  We ate at a local restaurant a few blocks away one night and saw a little of the nearby area.  If you're looking for a place to say, I definitely recommend this hotel.

The hotel and the room were clean.  The pillows and the bed were comfortable. There was easy access to the interstate and it was quiet even though the interstate was close. The rooms were beautiful, high ceilings make the rooms seem larger. We highly recommend.

Friendly staff and clean and comfortable rooms.  My room was quiet and pleasant.   The morning coffee was pretty good.  The breakfast was kind of lame, but that is to be expected.    It is a good location as well.  And even though it‚Äôs off the freeway, it is far enough away from I-5 that it isn‚Äôt noisy at all.   There is a nice small pool and outdoor jacuzzi as well.   I plan to stay there again.

Very enjoyable stay at brand-new Inn for one full week. Front desk staff provided concierge service recommendations to local restaurants and directions to local sites. The decor is delightful -- modern, youth-appealing, fun.

Summary Heading: One night stopover on way back from family event
Summary: Stayed one night on way back to airport. The room was quiet and comfortble, the staff helpful. Wi-fi was free. Nice secluded swiming pool. The main negative was the blah location. It is located in an auto mall. There is nothing interesting to see in this location. The hotel has o bar or dining room, though it does have an excellent complimentary breakfast., I was not in the mood for a drink but I could have walked several blocks through an auto dealership to one. There was no restaurant within site and, after the amount of driving I had already done, I wasn't interested in seeking one out.

Stayed at this hotel after leaving another Hampton due to it being run down. I was SO impressed when we arrived to the hotel. It was just opened about 7 months ago and is very modern looking.   I was greeted by a wonderful GSR who's named started with a D.. I think. She was extremely friendly and always had a smile on her face when I saw her. Later on in the evening I had the pleasure of speaking with Carlos as well. He was also extremely friendly and accommodating.   The room was very clean and had a great style. The only issue is that we had a room with two queen beds, because we brought friends, and the sliding door on the bathroom doesn't create much privacy. You can hear everything that the person does in the bathroom... awkward.   We got to enjoy the hot tub for all of

I stayed here kind of involuntarily.   I was booked at another hotel that's oversold and they moved me here.   Not at all a fancy hotel, but staff was friendly, the rooms were clean, and the wifi worked.  Nothing to complain about.

Summary Heading: Beautiful facility at a reasonable price
Summary: Firendly staff, very clean facility, complimentary breakfast somewhat limited. The coffee was average at best.  I didn't use the pool or spa but it looked very inviting.  The staff introduced me to the digital key process and were very helpful.

Super friendly and helpful staff.  They went way above and beyond to make my family's stay comfortable and pleasant.  My 2 year old was in heaven with all of the attention that she received from the staff members.

Summary Heading: Great staff, clean rooms and great location
Summary: Enjoyed our stay to the fullest. The staff was phenomenal- attentive to the max. Rooms were clean and neat. Showers were awesome. Ambiance was casual and welcoming. The location was central to just about everything- the Mission Viejo shops, Saddleback college, the mission at San Juan Capistrano and many other places.

Summary Heading: Clean hotel in a central location
Summary: We just returned last night from staying in the Hampton Inn and Suites for 4 nights. We have stayed in many places throughout Aliso Viejo, Mission Viejo and Laguna Beach. This hotel is on par with the rest. Clean hotel, very nice staff, quiet, and the central location is spot on for anything you may need. The cleaning staff was very quick and efficient as well. We would go down for a quick breakfast (which is good for continental) and come back and our room would be clean and smell nice. The pool area is nice as well and the jacuzzi was great. We would stay here again.

Easy access to highway - GREAT room - only needed 1 bed but it also included a desk and a very comfortable lounge chair.  The staff were very helpful, friendly and went out of their way to make sure everything was okay.

Nice new hotel close to our family and recreational activities. Easy access to the freeway which we could not hear at night. The staff was very accommodating when our room wasn‚Äôt ready at check in. There is a nice variety of breakfast items to enjoy each morning. We will definitely stay here again!

This is a new property.  The staff and facilities were near perfect. The check-in procedure was quick, easy and efficient.  All the employees were incredibly friendly and helpful.  Although my group stayed there because of location, I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone.  Kudos to all the employees!

As a lifetime Diamond member I travel frequently.  As I work often in the Irvine Spectrum area, I want to find a hotel that is close yet away from all the hustle and bustle of Irvine, yet relatively close, clean, new, and reasonably priced.  I have found this to be the case with Hampton Inn and Suites Mission Viejo.  I love the clean crisp nature of this almost brand new property.  There is a modern open breakfast area with healthy and traditional choices.  An outside sitting area, pool, and indoor and out door fireplaces.  The rooms are new clean and come with a refrigerator which are great for my trips to Trader Joes.  I have also been involved with step challenges at work, so there is a beautiful residential park like area to walk with ravines, palm trees, and sub-tropical

Accommodation choices in Mission Viejo have been quite limited for many years but we were delighted and surprised to find the Hampton Inn recently.  It is new, modern, clean, and attractive.  The rooms (bathroom included) are spacious, quiet, comfortable, and tastefully furnished.  It borders on "luxurious". The shower (no tub) was big and easy to use and the "amenities" in the bathroom are first-rate (not an "off" brand at all). The included breakfast surpassed any we have found in other motels.  The staff is friendly and helpful, arranging inexpensive transportation to John Wayne Airport for us.  We will return on future visits.  The only improvement that could be made is to assure that the hotel website is secured.

I was in Mission Viejo by myself to attend a funeral.   This is a brand new hotel so everything was new and completely modern.  Beyond that, the room and the bathroom were immaculately clean.   Every single member of the staff from check in to breakfast to housekeeping was cheerful, friendly and helpful.

the location is very convenient, just off the freeway.  the staff are professional. courteous, and friendly.  the firepit next to the pool was the best part.  the room was clean and very comfortable.  I highly recommend  this hotel.

We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel! Great customer service, comfortable big rooms. Wi-fi internet is excellent and strong throughout the hotel. Staff and everyone is super friendly. Breakfast is good and changes daily. We highly recommend!

Wonderful hotel for the price, and very clean. Great staff, excellent service, and all the amenities you could need. They have a beautiful outdoor pool space with cabanas and fire pits that really makes it look and feel expensive without the price tag of most hotels in the area.

Summary Heading: Poor guest service for the business traveler
Summary: The accommodations at this location are beautiful and clean, this is a really nice new property.  It is too bad that the guest service experience is not even close to what you would expect from this property.  I choose Hampton Inns for easy locations and a quick breakfast before work but this place had rude people working on the food area and at the height of the morning it took 45 minutes to replenish food.

Hotel is brand new. Rooms are very comfortable. Outdoor area with firepit and pool and large indoor tables with TV made it a great place for the family to come together. Decent food pantry.  No bar though.

We enjoyed everything about the Hampton Inn Mission Viejo. We would come back again! The location was ideal and the hotel is new and beautiful. Perfect location to the coast and to Disneyland and LA! Everything about it was perfect!

Stayed one night here to attend a family function that was nearby. Great value as breakfast was included. Rooms were clean and functional and staff was very friendly. There was construction on one side of the hotel and a car dealership on the other. This could be a problem if you are looking for scenic place to stay.
Manager Response: Hi Frank W.  Thank you for staying with us at the Hampton Inn and Suites Mission Viejo. We are happy that you enjoyed the short time you were here with us. Next time you are in town we hope that you decide to stay with us again so you could get to enjoy our fire pit that allows our guest to relax and enjoy a pool view.

Summary: We recently spent 4 nights at the Hampton Inn & Suites, Mission Viejo.  This hotel was very close to 5-star, in our opinion.  The room was extremely clean & well appointed -- and very quiet.  All the furnishings were first rate.   The best part of our experience was Dahlia at the front desk.  She was so helpful and courteous.  Special kudos for her professionalism and caring attitude. You just cannot find a nicer hotel for the price in all of Southern California.

We just stayed 4 nights for a wedding and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The lobby and outdoor area is modern and inviting. We used these spaces often as a meeting place for friends and family to get together and enjoy each others company. We mostly interacted with the night staff, who were all great. I believe it was Chris (sorry if I got that wrong) that checked us in when we arrived at 1am, he was very helpful in making suggestions for day trips. Also have to mention Carlos and Bojurie (I hope I got that right also!) for graciously accommodating our large group's late night gatherings. Beds are extremely comfortable and rooms are clean and spacious. Great location in close proximity to the highway, shopping, and dining. The only thing we didn't care for was the eggs and meat as

Super friendly staff, good location and very nice facilities. The staff was very helpful in attending our needs, they help us finding places to eat, watch football and making reservations for us.
